name: Hooper Falls TOJam2014
description:
Your car has broken down on a country road. You arrive at the steps of an old mansion. You enter, hoping they can help you and discover the horrors of Hooper Falls.

Explore a procedurally generated horror mansion in this text-adventure created for TOJam2014. Requires a browser to play, and is mouse and touchscreen compatible.

Design, Code and Writing by Joshua Mohan

Sound by Matthew Miller

Art by Adam Beardsley
